Text: The Honorable Norman Mineta Letter Cc All Today marks a tremendous milestone in that the letter that confirms the Pipeline Industry has joined together to address regulatory and legislative pipeline safety issues in a unified fashion has been delivered to the Secretary of Transportation Norman Mineta via courier These documents were also sent to select Senators Congressmen and Staff You as signatory to this letter acting as CEOs Chairman of Boards Executive Committees of Associations CEOs Presidents of the Associations and Institutes and Industry Leaders confirm the path forward for the entire industry and collectively we represent the entire industry We need to roll out this confirmation to all the industry stakeholders and encourage the use of these documents to advance our efforts A followup facetoface session with Secretary Mineta and a few of the CEOs will be worked into his busy schedule as soon as possible A copy of the signed document went out in the mail to you today and a electronic copy without the signatures is attached for your convenience Also attached is the OnePager that accompanied the letter and a Industry news release Congratulations to all who made this possible To you and yoursHappy Thanksgiving Joint CEO Mineta letterFinal Sentdoc Onepagerjointassociationsfinaldoc Joint Industry news release finaldoc Regards Joe Joint CEO Mineta letterFinal Sentdoc Onepagerjointassociationsfinaldoc Joint Industry news release finaldoc
